      • assertAndGetResourceOrRef

        public AbstractResource assertAndGetResourceOrRef​(Long resourceOrRefId)
        Retrieve the resource (or reference). If not found, throw a HttpErrorMessage.
        Parameters:
        resourceOrRefId - the id of the resource or reference
        Returns:
        the resource or reference if found
        Throws:
        ch.colabproject.colab.generator.model.exceptions.HttpErrorMessage - if the resource or reference was not found

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the resource if found
        Throws:
        ch.colabproject.colab.generator.model.exceptions.HttpErrorMessage - if the resource was not found

      • assertResourceReadWrite

        public void assertResourceReadWrite​(Long id)
        Get the card content identified by the given id
        Parameters:
        id - id of the card to access
        Throws:
        ch.colabproject.colab.generator.model.exceptions.HttpErrorMessage - if the document was not found or access denied

      • assertAndGetResourceRef

        public ResourceRef assertAndGetResourceRef​(Long resourceRefId)
        Retrieve the resource reference. If not found, throw a HttpErrorMessage.
        Parameters:
        resourceRefId - the id of the resource reference
        Returns:
        the resource reference if found
        Throws:
        ch.colabproject.colab.generator.model.exceptions.HttpErrorMessage - if the resource reference was not found

      • getExpandedResourcesForAbstractCardType

        public List<List<AbstractResource>> getExpandedResourcesForAbstractCardType​(Long cardTypeOrRefId)
        Retrieve the abstract resources directly linked to an abstract card type and all the chain of references to the concrete resource
        Parameters:
        cardTypeOrRefId - The id of the card type or reference
        Returns:
        For each direct abstract resource, the chain of abstract resources to the resource

      • getExpandedResourcesForCard

        public List<List<AbstractResource>> getExpandedResourcesForCard​(Long cardId)
        Retrieve the abstract resources directly linked to a card and all the chain of references to the concrete resource
        Parameters:
        cardId - The id of the card
        Returns:
        For each direct abstract resource, the chain of abstract resources to the resource

      • getExpandedResourcesForCardContent

        public List<List<AbstractResource>> getExpandedResourcesForCardContent​(Long cardContentId)
        Retrieve the abstract resources directly linked to a card content and all the chain of references to the concrete resource
        Parameters:
        cardContentId - The id of the card content
        Returns:
        For each direct abstract resource, the chain of abstract resources to the resource

      • getDirectAbstractResourcesOfProject

        public List<AbstractResource> getDirectAbstractResourcesOfProject​(Long projectId)
        Get the resources directly linked to the given project.

        Does not fetch all chain references.

        Parameters:
        projectId - the id of the project
        Returns:
        resources directly linked to the given project

      • getResourceExternalReferences

        public List<ResourceExternalReference> getResourceExternalReferences​(Long abstractResourceId)
        Get the list of project which reference the given resource, excluding the project which owns the resource.
        Parameters:
        abstractResourceId - if of the targeted resource
        Returns:
        list of externalReference

      • createResource

        public Resource createResource​(Resource resource)
        Complete and persist the given resource and create all the references needed.

        Every child of the entity acquires a reference to that resource.
        And recursively the grand children acquires a reference to the reference of their parent.

        Parameters:
        resource - the resource to create
        Returns:
        the brand new resource

      • changeResourceLexicalConversionStatus

        public void changeResourceLexicalConversionStatus​(Long id,
                                                  ConversionStatus status)
        Set the lexical conversion status.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the resource
        status - the new lexical conversion status to set

      • deleteResource

        public void deleteResource​(Long resourceId)
        Delete the given resource
        Parameters:
        resourceId - the id of the resource to delete

      • copyResourceTo

        public Resource copyResourceTo​(Long resourceId,
                               DuplicationParam params,
                               String parentType,
                               Long parentId,
                               boolean published)
        Duplicate the given resource with the given parameters to fine tune the duplication
        Parameters:
        resourceId - the id of the project to duplicate
        params - the parameters to fine tune the duplication
        parentType - the new owner
        parentId - if of the new owner
        published - new publication status
        Returns:
        the new project

        Discard the resource (or reference) so that it cannot be visible anymore
        Parameters:
        resourceOrRefId - the id of the resource or reference

        Parameters:

        Parameters:

        parentType - the new owner
        parentId - if of the new owner
        published - new publication status

      • addDocument

        public Document addDocument​(Long resourceId,
                            Document document)
        Add the document to the end of the resource.
        Parameters:
        resourceId - the id of the resource
        document - the document to use in the resource. It must be a new document
        Returns:
        the newly created document

      • addDocument

        public Document addDocument​(Long resourceId,
                            Document document,
                            RelatedPosition relatedPosition)
        Add the document to the resource. It will be placed on the given relatedPosition.
        Parameters:
        resourceId - the id of the resource
        document - the document to use in the resource. It must be a new document
        relatedPosition - to define the place where the document will be added in the resource
        Returns:
        the newly created document

      • addDocument

        public Document addDocument​(Long resourceId,
                            Document document,
                            RelatedPosition relatedPosition,
                            Long neighbourDocId)
        Add the document to the resource.
        Parameters:
        resourceId - the id of the resource
        document - the document to use in the resource. It must be a new document
        relatedPosition - to define the place where the document will be added in the resource
        neighbourDocId - the existing document which defines where the new document will be set. If relatedPosition is BEFOR or AFTER, it must be not null
        Returns:
        the newly created document

      • removeDocument

        public void removeDocument​(Long resourceId,
                           Long documentId)
        Remove the document of the resource
        Parameters:
        resourceId - the id of the resource
        documentId - the id of the document to remove

      • getDocumentsOfResource

        public List<Document> getDocumentsOfResource​(Long resourceId)
        Get the documents of the resource
        Parameters:
        resourceId - the id of the resource
        Returns:
        the documents linked to the resource

      • getStickyNoteLinkAsSrc

        public List<StickyNoteLink> getStickyNoteLinkAsSrc​(Long resourceOrRefId)
        Get all sticky note links whose source is the given resource / resource reference
        Parameters:
        resourceOrRefId - the id of the resource / resource reference
        Returns:
        all sticky note links linked to the resource / resource reference

      • checkIntegrity

        public boolean checkIntegrity​(AbstractResource resourceOrRef)
        Check the integrity of the card type (or reference)
        Parameters:
        resourceOrRef - the resource (or reference) to check
        Returns:
        true iff the project is complete and safe
